Token.Abstract: The HTMLDocument class represents an HTML document. It is parsed on initialization.
Initializes a new HTML document with the contents of the given URL.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The URL pointing to the contents for the new HTML document.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to an error object, used for reporting any error occurring along the way.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new HTML document or nil if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new HTML document using the given data.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data to initialize the HTML document with.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to an error object, used for reporting any error occurring along the way.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new HTML document or nil if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Initializes a new HTML document with the contents of the given string.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A pointer to an error object, used for reporting any error occurring along the way.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new HTML document or nil if an error occurred.

Token.Abstract: Returns the contents of this HTML document.
Returns that part of this HTML document that is enclosed in <html>...</html> tags.
Returns that part of this HTML document that is enclosed in <body>...</body> tags.
Returns that part of this HTML document that is enclosed in <head>...</head> tags.
